features.name: Before & After Results
features.description: Visual transformation showcase with before/after comparisons
features.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { ArrowRight, Zap } from 'lucide-react' export default function Features() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Amazing Transformations", description: "See the incredible results our expert team delivers. Real projects, real transformations, real satisfaction.", projects: [ { title: "Kitchen Renovation", description: "Complete kitchen transformation with modern appliances, custom cabinetry, and elegant countertops.", beforeImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556909114-f6e7ad7d3136?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", afterImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556909195-4b4b7d7b98c9?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", duration: "2 weeks", investment: "$25,000" }, { title: "Bathroom Remodel", description: "Luxury bathroom upgrade with spa-like features, premium fixtures, and modern tile work.", beforeImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1620626011761-996317b8d101?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", afterImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552321554-5fefe8c9ef14?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", duration: "10 days", investment: "$18,000" }, { title: "Backyard Landscaping", description: "Complete outdoor transformation with professional landscaping, patio installation, and lighting.", beforeImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1416879595882-3373a0480b5b?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", afterImage: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544966503-7cc5ac882d5f?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", duration: "1 week", investment: "$15,000" } ] } return (

{data.description}

features.name: Service Area Coverage
features.description: Geographic service coverage with response times and local focus
features.template:
import { MapPin, Clock, Phone, Users, CheckCircle, Truck } from 'lucide-react' export default function Features() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Serving Your Community", description: "Fast, reliable service across the metro area with guaranteed response times and local expertise you can trust.", serviceInfo: { mainArea: "Metro City Area", responseTime: "30 minutes", serviceRadius: "25 miles", availability: "24/7 Emergency", teamSize: "12 technicians", vehicleFleet: "8 service trucks" }, serviceAreas: [ { area: "Downtown Metro", responseTime: "15-30 minutes", coverage: "Full Coverage", phone: "(555) 123-4567" }, { area: "North Valley", responseTime: "20-35 minutes", coverage: "Full Coverage", phone: "(555) 123-4567" }, { area: "West Hills", responseTime: "25-40 minutes", coverage: "Full Coverage", phone: "(555) 123-4567" }, { area: "East Side", responseTime: "20-35 minutes", coverage: "Full Coverage", phone: "(555) 123-4567" }, { area: "South County", responseTime: "30-45 minutes", coverage: "Selected Areas", phone: "(555) 123-4567" }, { area: "Outer Suburbs", responseTime: "45-60 minutes", coverage: "By Appointment", phone: "(555) 123-4567" } ] } return (

features.name: Service Process Steps
features.description: Step-by-step service process with timeline and what to expect
features.template:
import { Phone, Calendar, Wrench, CheckCircle, FileText, Star, Clock } from 'lucide-react' export default function Features() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Our Simple, Transparent Process", description: "From initial contact to project completion, here's exactly what you can expect when you choose our professional services.", processSteps: [ { step: 1, title: "Initial Contact", description: "Call or schedule online. We'll discuss your needs and provide immediate answers to your questions.", icon: "phone", duration: "15 minutes", details: "Free consultation • No obligation • Same-day response" }, { step: 2, title: "On-Site Assessment", description: "Professional evaluation with detailed inspection and accurate measurements for precise estimates.", icon: "fileText", duration: "30-45 minutes", details: "Thorough inspection • Digital photos • Written assessment" }, { step: 3, title: "Detailed Estimate", description: "Comprehensive written estimate with transparent pricing, timeline, and material specifications.", icon: "calendar", duration: "24-48 hours", details: "Written estimate • Material breakdown • Fixed pricing" }, { step: 4, title: "Professional Work", description: "Expert installation or repair by licensed technicians using premium materials and proven methods.", icon: "wrench", duration: "As scheduled", details: "Licensed professionals • Premium materials • Clean workspace" }, { step: 5, title: "Quality Inspection", description: "Thorough quality check and walkthrough to ensure everything meets our high standards and your expectations.", icon: "checkCircle", duration: "15 minutes", details: "Quality checklist • Customer walkthrough • Satisfaction confirmation" }, { step: 6, title: "Follow-Up Support", description: "Warranty registration, maintenance tips, and ongoing support for complete customer satisfaction.", icon: "star", duration: "Ongoing", details: "5-year warranty • Maintenance tips • 24/7 support" } ] } const iconMap = { phone: Phone, calendar: Calendar, wrench: Wrench, checkCircle: CheckCircle, fileText: FileText, star: Star } return (

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Timeline Line */}
{data.processSteps.map((step, index) => { const IconComponent = iconMap[step.icon as keyof typeof iconMap] || Phone return (
{/* Step Card */}
STEP {step.step}

{step.title}

{step.description}

Duration: {step.duration}
{step.details}
{/* Timeline Node */}
{step.step}
{/* Empty space for opposite side */}
) })}

Ready to Get Started?

Call us today for a free, no-obligation consultation and estimate.

(555) 123-4567
) }
